roleset.name: equalize, make uniform, equal, without variation
roleset.note: EVEN-V NOTES: Added by Julia for unification. (from even.02-v)
EVEN-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP. (from even.01-j)

role.descr: second equal thing, even in comparison to what

example.name: al args
example.text: Zeno the Epicurean, who has been mentioned before. k Timocrates, according to Diogenes Laertius, was even with him inhis abuses.
example.arg: Zeno the Epicurean, who has been mentioned before. k Timocrates, according to Diogenes Laertius

example.name: Both args
example.text: Pearl's evening of the amount of batter in each cupcake liner resulted in perfectly even cupcakes.
example.arg: of the amount of batter in each cupcake liner

roleset.name: divisible by 2
roleset.note: EVEN-J NOTES: Added by Julia for unification

example.name: arg1
example.text: The crossing number is even if and only if the point is outside the polygon.
example.arg: if and only if the point is outside the polygon

roleset.name: to make or become even
roleset.note: EVEN_OUT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'even' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from even.01-v predicate notes)
EVENING-N NOTES: Corresponds with even.01 (from evening.01-n)

roles.note: nothing to do with nighttime (from evening.01-n)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: GOP pollster Neil Newhouse , of the Wirthlin Group , says [0] polls this summer showed that the single-issue voters had aboutevened out .
